title: What are the moral standards that we follow? - Quora

response.answer_text: You'll have to define what “we” you're talking about. Moral standards vary widely across and even within cultures to the point that my moral standards would likely be different from yours, even if we had grown up in the same neighborhood and gone to the same school. Cultures also vary across time, and rather quickly. In every culture across the world, children live by a different moral standard than their parents. Even within religions, moral standards can change in as little as a decade.
